members.doc: Logo image ID (for internal use).

members.name: width
members.doc: Logo image width.

members.name: height
members.doc: Logo image height.

docs.summary: Position of the corner of the cover image (or logo)

members.name: x
members.doc: horizontal coordinate

members.name: y
members.doc: vertical coordinate

members.name: role
members.doc:
Group member role
- `MEMBER` - Regular group member
- `ADMIN` - Group admin
One of:
 + `"UNKNOWN_ROLE"`
 + `"MEMBER"`
 + `"ADMIN"`

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Site Member ID of Group Member

members.name: joinedDate
members.doc: Date and time the group Member joined the group.

docs.summary: Site owners may choose to require that site members request approval when creating groups (available in the Wix Business Manager under Groups Application Settings).
description: When approval is required, only a groups manager can approve a request to create a new group.
When a group request is approved, the new group is added to the groups lists in the Wix UI.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Group request ID

members.name: status
members.doc:
Status of group request.
- `PENDING` - Pending group request.
- `APPROVED` - Approved group request.
- `REJECTED` - Rejected group request.
- `CANCELLED` - Cancelled group request.
One of:
 + `"UNKNOWN_STATUS"`
 + `"PENDING"`
 + `"APPROVED"`
 + `"REJECTED"`
 + `"CANCELLED"`

members.name: rejectionReason
members.doc: Group request rejection reason.

members.name: group
members.doc: Group requested for creation.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Group ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Group title.

members.name: slug
members.doc: A unique part of a group's URL (e.g., 'https:/example.com/groups/slug').

members.name: description
members.doc: Group description in DraftJS format.

members.name: privacyStatus
members.doc:
Group privacy level.
- `PUBLIC` - Anyone can see group in groups list and its content. Anyone can join group.
- `PRIVATE` - Anyone can see group in groups list, but only group members can see its content. In order to join group, a group join request should be submitted.
- `SECRET` - Only group members and a groups manager can see group in group list. New group members can only be added by other group members.
One of:
 + `"UNKNOWN"`
 + `"PUBLIC"`
 + `"PRIVATE"`
 + `"SECRET"`

members.name: coverImage
members.doc: Group details.

members.name: memberTitle
members.doc: What group members are called (e.g., 'Coworkers', 'Friends', 'Students').

members.name: settings
members.doc: Group settings.

members.name: lastActivityDate
members.doc: Date and time the group was last active (e.g., last post or comment).

members.name: createdBy
members.doc: Site member ID of the group creator.

members.name: image
members.doc: Group logo. You cannot upload your own logo.

members.name: logoPosition
members.doc: Position of the corner of the cover image (or logo)

members.name: image
members.doc: Group logo. You cannot upload your own logo.

members.name: position
members.doc: Position of the corner of the cover image (or logo)

members.name: membersCanInvite
members.doc: Whether all group members are permitted to add/invite new group members to group with any privacy level. When `false`, member additions/invitations are limited to group admins. Defaults to true.

members.name: membersCanApprove
members.doc: Whether all group members are permitted to approve join group requests. When `false`, member approval is limited to the group admins.

members.name: welcomeMemberPostEnabled
members.doc: Whether to create a daily post about new members.

members.name: groupUpdatePostEnabled
members.doc: Whether to create a post when group details are changed.

members.name: showMemberList
members.doc: Whether all group members can view the group member list.

members.name: membersCanInvite
members.doc: Whether all group members are permitted to add/invite new group members to group with any privacy level. When `false`, member additions/invitations are limited to group admins. Defaults to true.

members.name: membersCanApprove
members.doc: Whether all group members are permitted to approve join group requests. When `false`, member approval is limited to the group admins.

members.name: welcomeMemberPostEnabled
members.doc: Whether to create a daily post about new members.

members.name: groupUpdatePostEnabled
members.doc: Whether to create a post when group details are changed.

members.name: showMemberList
members.doc: Whether all group members can view the group member list.

docs.summary: To join a private group, a site member must submit a join group request, which can be approved or rejected by a group admin or a groups manager.
description: When a join group request is approved, the site member becomes a group member.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Site member ID of requester

members.name: status
members.doc:
Join group request status.
- `PENDING` - Pending join group request.
- `APPROVED` - Approved join group request.
- `REJECTED` - Rejected join group request.
- `CANCELLED` - Cancelled join group request.
One of:
 + `"UNKNOWN_STATUS"`
 + `"PENDING"`
 + `"APPROVED"`
 + `"REJECTED"`
 + `"CANCELLED"`

members.name: rejectionReason
members.doc: Group request rejection reason.

members.name: suppressAuth
members.doc: When `true`, prevents permission checks from running for the operation.

members.name: length
members.doc: Number of items returned in the response.

members.name: totalCount
members.doc: Total number of items that match the query.

members.name: tooManyToCount
members.doc: Flag that indicates the server failed to calculate the `total` field.
